item.title: Visiting Cebu – The Queen City of the South
item.description: We start off our Filipino adventures in Cebu which is located in the Central Visayas. Cebu is the 2nd largest city in the Philippines. Love how colourful the currency is! Kyle had a few work commitments to catch up with so we visited Cebu first as we knew there were coworking spaces available. Cebu is also a great base to explore beaches, nature and wildlife. Cebu has one of the countryâ€™s busiest ferry ports with regular vessel services to nearby islands and longer distant routes to islands such as Manila.
